snippet: Shares of Fusion-io Inc. rose 28 percent on Friday after the company, which makes flash memory products, reported fiscal fourth-quarter results well above Wall Street’s expectations on Thursday.
abstract: Shares of Fusion-io Inc rise 28 percent after the company reports fiscal fourth-quarter results well above Wall Street's expectations; company had a loss of $2.4 million, or 3 cents a share, in the April-June period; revenue rose 49 percent to $106.6 million, from $71.7 million a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Fusion-io Inc. rose 28 percent on Friday after the company, which makes flash memory products, reported fiscal fourth-quarter results well above Wall Street’s expectations on Thursday.

headline.main: Data Concern Gains 28% After Strong Quarter
headline.print_headline: Data Concern Gains 28% After Strong Quarter
